plateAvailability.label: Plate Availability Data
plateAvailability.dataAvailable: Available plate numbers up to date: {date}.

AboutIntro: From your input word or short text, this page will show you how a custom registration plate for personal cars in the Czech Republic could look.
The page checks certain requirements for the form and structure of plates and sometimes corrects or resolves violations of required properties.

content: input text is displayed in capital letters on the plate
the plate is visually divided into two parts (3 and 5 positions)
characters other than letters and numbers are omitted
diacritical marks (caron, comma, ring, etc.) are removed from letters
invalid letters on the plate are automatically replaced with similar-looking numbers
if at least one number is missing on the plate, a number is automatically added
tries to avoid plates starting with EL
input shorter than 8 characters is filled with additional characters
input longer than 8 characters is shortened by omitting vowels

AboutDetails.content: The page, however, does not check these requirements:

content: the plate must not "contain vulgar or offensive expressions"
requirements for motorcycle plates (7 characters) and moped plates (5 characters)

portalLink.prefix: For getting a custom registration plate, continue to
portalLink.linkText: Registrační značka na přání on the Public administration portal

inputSection.label: Input
inputSection.addPlateDisabledTitle: Fill in the current plate first

errors.noNumber: At least one number is required
errors.adjacentSkippedVowels: Cannot have two skipped vowels next to each other
errors.tooManyConsonants: Too many consonants for registration plate
errors.noPositionForNumber: Cannot create valid plate: no position for required number

multiLineInputModal.title: Multiple plates
multiLineInputModal.help: Enter up to 10 plates, one per line.

shiftButton.boundaryReachedLeft: Cannot shift left - reached start of plate
shiftButton.boundaryReachedRight: Cannot shift right - reached end of plate
shiftButton.nonPaddingCharFoundLeft: Cannot shift left - blocked by another character
shiftButton.nonPaddingCharFoundRight: Cannot shift right - blocked by another character

csvUpload.title: Plate availability data

instructions.intro: Download a csv with issued and reserved plate numbers through link "Výpis vydaných a rezervovaných RZP" from
instructions.outro: and save it locally to your browser by uploading below.

csvUpload.overwriteWarning: The uploaded data is older or has fewer entries than the existing data
csvUpload.dataUpdated: Data has been updated with newer information
csvUpload.dataOverwritten: Data has been overwritten with uploaded data

noData.button: upload issued and reserved plate numbers here

errors.tooManyVowels: Too many vowels to fit in plate number
